title: HOW TO CHANG E-MAIL    BUT I FORGET THE OLD ONE ~!
body: help  me ....i cant play game now...{{summoner:39}}

replies.body:
You can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for account recovery, and if you can prove the account is yours they will change your email for you. Just choose the "I need help recovering my account." option and provide them as much information as you can.

Since this sub-board is intended for discussing the Boards or their moderation, I'm going to lock the post. The appropriate place would be [Help & Support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M), but the best way to reach out to Player Support is through a ticket and on Twitter [@riotsupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)

https://i.gyazo.com/60dae3aaeeb6bf71919cf40fc9e2213e.gif

You cant, without having the email. It is the last line of security for an account.

This is why you should not register to a throwaway account, or even have throwaway accounts at all.
